Guardian Stalker

Known Locations

  • Gerudo Highlands
  • Eldin Canyon
  • Hyrule Field

Health

  • 1500

Attacks

  • Can move around
  • Will chase down or follow
  • Shoots lasers

Attack Methods

  • Shoot arrows at the eye
  • Deflect lasers with shield
  • Attack legs to break them (remove all to make immobile)
  • Attack with regular melee attacks after making immobile
